<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_854636_b_board_architecture_template</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>created Cat Item</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var brainboardUtility = new x_854636_b_board.BrainboardUtility();
		var tableName = "x_854636_b_board_architecture_template";
		var recordSysId =  current.getValue("sys_id");
		var iconfileName = "architecture_template_icon_" + current.getValue("sys_id");
		var picturefileName = "architecture_template_picture_" + current.getValue("sys_id");
		var thumbnail_url = current.getValue("thumbnail_url");
		var snapshot_url = current.getValue("snapshot_url");

		var icon = brainboardUtility.attachImage(tableName, recordSysId, iconfileName, thumbnail_url);
		var picture = brainboardUtility.attachImage(tableName, recordSysId, picturefileName, snapshot_url);
		brainboardUtility.createCatalogItem(recordSysId, icon, picture);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yohanes.yilma</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-28 14:36:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e4cec287c367e2107e68b41ed40131a4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>created Cat Item</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Brainboard" source="x_854636_b_board">7062797e832822103e53f065eeaad32b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Brainboard">7062797e832822103e53f065eeaad32b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e4cec287c367e2107e68b41ed40131a4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yohanes.yilma</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-28 14:36:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e4cec287c367e2107e68b41ed40131a4"/></record_update>
